job.title: Python Developer/Cloud Engineer
job.description: Going digital requires holistic thinking that puts humans at the center of everything. Entech delivers complete solutions including strategies, technologies, and implementation services to master digital convergence. We integrate our unique outside-in approach to people, processes, and technology to orchestrate digital empowerment to address today's business challenges. Mastering digital convergence at enterprise scale.We are looking for a Python Developer/Cloud Engineer who is passionate about technology and adopting modern software engineering practices.CloudFormation is a must-havePython - Must be a seasoned Python developerDevOps CI/CD - Must be very strong in CI/CD and exposure to the typical tools (GIT, Jenkins, etc.) - know how to create templates that trigger action in the pipeline. Typical AWS tech stack elements - Lambda, ECS, S3, etc.Work with architects and other IT and business groups to identify technical and functional needs of applications based on priorityDesign, build serverless solutions for cross-functional, multi-platform internal and client-facing applicationsAbility to decipher complex, ambiguous customer needs and translate into optimal feature deliveryWriting great quality code with a drive for automated testing and validationThinks in terms of architecture as well as code. Able to develop and evaluate solutions for strengths and weaknesses (e.g., complexity, quality, scalability, latency, security, performance, data integrity, etc.) which are key for an enterprise engineerExperience working with AWS technologies (Lambda, S3, Glue, Kinesis, DDB, RDS, Step functions, SQS\SNS, AppSync)Understands software engineering best practices (e.g. CI\CD automated pipelines, Operational Excellence, Information Security IAM)Experience with deployments and dev opsExperience with application integration via APIs/REST, API GatewaysExperience providing technical leadership and mentoring other engineers on best practicesÂ Experience with UI/UX and AWS cloud development: TypeScript/JavaScript/NodeJS/Java/ Python/CloudFormation/AWS SDKExperience with cloud technologies and security: AWS, IAM, Okta OIDC, Auth0, API Gateways (Kong, CA API Gateway, AWS API Gateway)Experience or exposure in build and CI\CD technologies: GitHub, BitBucket, DevOps, Nexus or SonarExposure to Agile development conceptsBonus if exposure to Containers and orchestration: Docker, Fargate, Kubernetes, etc.Hands on building multi region architectures5+ years of professional software development experience2+ years of experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systemsBachelorâs degree in Computer Science or equivalent certifications or work experience
